Skills.Name: Overdrive
Skills.Description:
Inflicts <color=red>{0}%</color> DMG on enemies within 100 cm of
target enemy.
Skills.ShortDescription: Inflicts DMG on all enemies within range

Skills.Name: Strike Combo
Skills.Description: Inflicts <color=red>75.00%-1500.00%</color> DMG according to Combo Bonus.

Skills.Name: Eminence in Shadow
Skills.Description: At start of Wave, raises DMG Inflicted for all allies by <color=red>{0}%</color>. (Permanent)
Skills.ShortDescription:
At start of Wave, raises
DMG Inflicted for all allies

target enemy.
Skills.ShortDescription: Inflicts DMG on all enemies within range

Skills.Name: Eminence in Shadow: Cid Only
Skills.Description: Each time DMG is inflicted, recovers HP of single ally with lowest HP by <color=red>{0}%</color> of ATK. Further raises DEF by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 10s and recovers SP by <color=red>{2}</color> if Blue Elemental.
Skills.ShortDescription: Each time DMG is inflicted, recovers HP of single ally. Further raises DEF and recovers SP if Blue Elemental
